column4: hi all... it seems that our ffmpeg doesn't come configured with mp3 codecs (when trying to transcode an mpeg movie to flv and forcing it to use mp3 streams, it claims that the codec is unsupported). Any clue how to fix that?
try this link re codecs and conversions: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=766683
I followed the link you posted earlier... still the same error though (unsupported codec for mp3)
